content: आहत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Struck, beaten (as a drum &c.); <ls>Ku. 4. 25</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 4.">30</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 77.</ls> {@--2@} Trodden; पादाहतं यदुत्थाय मूर्धानमधिरोहति <ls>Śi. 2. 46</ls>; गजदंताहता वृक्षाः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} Injured, killed. {@--4@} Dispelled, destroyed, removed. {@--5@} Multiplied (in <ab>Math.</ab>); सूर्याब्धिसंख्यया द्वित्रिसागरैरयुताहतैः <ls>Sūrya S.</ls>; एकैकमब्देषु नवाहतेषु <ls>Bṛ. S. 8. 22.</ls> {@--6@} Known, understood. {@--7@} Rolled (as dice). {@--8@} Uttered falsely. --तः A drum. --तं {@--1@} A new cloth or garment. {@--2@} An old garment. {@--3@} A nonsensical or meaningless speech, an assertion of impossibility; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} एष वंध्यासुतो याति <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>
